text: Reese Witherspoon has found herself embroiled in her ex - husband's domestic abuse trial. Elsie Hewitt, 21, is demanding that the Oscar winner turn over any communications she had with Ryan Phillipe, 43, about the night he allegedly attacked the Playboy Playmate, who he had been dating for just a few months. This demand comes in court papers filed by Hewitt's lawyer Shiqi Borjigin, who accuses Phillipe's representatives of purposely delaying the case and driving up costs for the plaintiff for the benefit of the defendant. Hewitt said in a complaint filed back in September that Phillipe grabbed her arm so hard it left bruises and twice threw her down a flight of stairs inside his home when she went to gather some of her belongings early on the morning of July 4 last year.
